name: VNClassificationObservation
desc: An object that represents classification information that an image analysis request produces.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: Classification label identifying the type of observation.

items.name: var hasPrecisionRecallCurve: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean variable indicating whether the observation contains precision and recall curves.

items.name: func hasMinimumPrecision(Float, forRecall: Float) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the observation for a specific recall has a minimum precision value.

items.name: func hasMinimumRecall(Float, forPrecision: Float) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the observation for a specific precision has a minimum recall value.
